youtube.title: How Doctors Remove Fluid From Lungs: Thoracentesis Procedure Explained
youtube.description: Discover the step-by-step medical process of removing excess fluid from the pleural space around the lungs. This educational animation simplifies the thoracentesis procedure, showing how doctors use precise techniques to help patients breathe easier.
